S.FORM: mou-nounang ti Jesus tou Saidd ki vaoung ki Galilæa, ni-kytt-'an tyn ta rarouha ki mahta-tæ'i-appa-ra, ta ti Simon ka Petrus ki siouwa, ti Andreas-appa ka tæ'i-appara tyn, ka smaki-vaoung ki rarei-houl (ka na-tama-'ou-d'llum ta neni.)
19 Ka ni-k'm-'ato-hynna nei-ni-æn, mæu-æuu-hâ jau-an, ka pa-sih-qua-au-mau-kamou pa-'ou-d'llum ki kaæuloung.
20 Ka dou madys atta-ral ki rarei-houl, ni-æu-æuug-han nein-tyni-æn.

21 Heirou ka ni-mali-deua ta teni makka-qua-hynna, ni-k'ytt'an tyn ta rarouha ki mahta-tæ'i-appa-ra ka pani, ta ti Jakobus [k'allak] ti Zebedæus, ti Joannes-appa ka tæ'i-appara tyn touh-para ti Ama nein ka ti Zebedæus tou avang si-ä-papat ki k'akæuæur nein, ka ni-t'æt'æ-æm tyn ta teni.
22 Ra neni k'anna dou ni-ma-dys d'marang ki avang ka talou, ki Raram'an-appa nein, ni-mæu-'æuugh tyni-æn.

23 Ka ni-hmæ-veiæh tau-ryt-toung ta ti Jesus tou ymmud ki Galilæa, mahtatæutæuugh tou Pæui-sa-saäl-en nein, matta-sasou ki Ha-gnau ka Mariang ki Pei-sasou-an, pæh-darkiagh ymmid ki maälam, ymd-appa ki mi-væuǣloung tou tautau-an.
